name: Release 4.5.6
body:
- Added: Karlsruhe, Biberach (Riß), Glarus, HSVN Hannover, DHBW Lörrach, Prien, Winnenden
- Added option to skip the confirmation dialog on prolonging an item (thanks to Adam Lazarus!)
- Added a barcode scanning button when adding new accounts (thanks to YKassim!)
- Added Polish translation
- Updated configuration in: Hildesheim, Eberswalde, Holzgerlingen, Preetz and others
- Improved loading of covers in the correct size
- Fixed some crashes
- Fixed empty account display instead of an error message if a password is wrong in some libraries
- Allow the app to be called from other apps with more options
- Added a "tutorial" for the account switcher

name: Release 4.5.4
body:
- Fixed some problems related to the reminder feature
- Prolonging an item now needs to be confirmed in a new dialog
- Export feature for account data
- Support for: LBZ Rheinland-Pfalz, Gomaringen, Herne, Penzberg, Walldorf, Wildeshausen, Buchen, Rapperswil-Jona
- Fixed problems in: Frechen, München
- Updated configuration in: Marl, Baden-Baden, Halle
- Improved cover download

name: Release 4.5.0
body:
- First stable release of libopac as a standalone library
- Re-implementation of the reminder feature
- Fixed error that led to blurred covers
- Updated translations, added Czech and Japanese translation
- Fixed problems when scanning barcodes in landscape mode
- Support for: WRS Lüneburg, MZU Tübingen, Weißenfels, Werne, Marburg, Friedberg, Radebeul
- Updated configuration in: Gladbeck, Marl

name: Release 4.4.0
body:
Support for: Dornbirn, THM Gießen, Isny, UB Kassel, BCU Lausanne, Naunhof, Neufahrn bei Freising, Niefern-Öschelbronn, Ostfildern, Schwandorf, Sulzbach (Saar), Tuttlingen, Weil am Rhein, SRH Neckargemünd
Celebrating 1,000+ libraries! Cleaner design for the navigation drawer Fixed a search bug in some libraries using PICA Fixed login problems (and possibly reservations) in Munich Fixed configuration in: Speyer, Lüdenscheid, Gelsenkirchen, Troisdorf Fixed problems in Geltendorf (thanks Stefan Mayr)

name: Release 4.3.3
body:
Compatibility with Android 6.0
Added warnings about possible reservation fees
Support for: HS Wismar, Dülmen, Metelen, Ahlen, Beckum, Neubeckum, Telgte, Warendorf, Kehl, HS Aalen, Jüterbog, Weil im Schönbuch, Stahnsdorf
Bugfixes and configuration updates for: UB Potsdam, KHSB Berlin, Öhringen, UB Eichstätt-Ingolstadt, Bonn

name: Release 4.3.0
body:
- Support for OPEN library search
- Support for web-opac.at

name: Release 4.0.0
body:
Design reworking
Support for: BLS Hamburg, Kösching, Wehr,
Fixed problems in Berlin (thanks to hurzl), Ulm, libraries in Frankfurt
Fixed a bug with reservations

name: Release 3.3.0
body:
English, Italian and Turkish translation
Bugs fixed for: Marl, Bad Schwartau and others
Support for: Uni Heidelberg, FH Bielefeld, Burgdorf, Geldern, MH Hannover, Saalfeld, Asperg

name: Release 3.2.0
body:
Grundüberarbeitetes Suchformular
Unterstützung von: Hirschberg, Kalkar, Kevelaer, Kevelaer-Twisteden, Klagenfurt, Leinfelden-Echterdingen, Löningen, Lyss, Reken, DAI Tübingen, HBK Braunschweig, Brunsbüttel, Heide, Husum, Langnau/Albis, Preetz, Prenzlau, Senden (Bayern), Stadtlohn, Tarp, Uetersen

name: Release 3.0.0
body:
- Große Überarbeitung der Oberfläche: Tablet-Ansicht für Suchergebnisse und Merkliste, 
  allgemeine Tablet-Optimierungen, Neuimplementierung der Navigation, Endloses Scrollen statt Weiterblättern
- Einstellbarkeit des Menüpunkts, mit dem die App startet
- Unterstützung von: Berlin, München, Zürich, Nürnberg, UB Tübingen, UB Freiburg, Dormagen, Grevenbroich, Muho Karlsruhe, Muho Mannheim, Meerbusch, UB Stuttgart, UB Ulm, FH Erfhurt, UB Erfurt, FH Nordhausen, UB Göttingen, UB Hildesheim, EAH Jena, HS Osnabrück, EBS Wiesbaden, FH Braunschweig, Jade HS Elsfleth/Wilhelmshaven, HS Hannover, UB Mainz, UB Greifswald, Muho Hannover, UB Ilmenau, UB Postdam, FH Schmalkalden, FH Stralsund
- Verschiedene Fehler behoben in allen Bibliothekssystemen

name: Release 2.1.0
body:
Erweiterte Unterstützung von: Köln, Hamburg
Unterstützung von: Detmold, LLB Detmold, Garching b. München
Cover in der Ergebnisliste (manche Bibliotheken)
Probleme behoben in: Magdeburg, Leutenbach

- Layout-Änderungen an der Detailanzeige (Ziel: Kürzerer Scrollweg zu den Exemplaren)
- Erweiterte Unterstützung von Rastatt
- Unterstützung von: Staatsbibliothek Berlin, TU Braunschweig, UB Halle, UB Hamburg (Helmut-Schmidt-Universität), ULB Jena, UB Lüneburg, UB Magdeburg, UB/Regionalkatalog Rostock, Cham, Schleswig, Reutlingen
